body.name: S21 Ultra 5.0 Inch HD Display Smartphone, Support Face Recognition, Dual Card Dual Standby, 48MP Camera, 1GB RAM and 4GB ROM, 4900mAh Capacity Battery(Green)

features: Support Expansion: The maximum supported memory is 128GB, while the cell phone has 1GB RAM and 4GB ROM.The 5.0in smartphone supports simultaneous use of two SIM cards and a memory card for phone calls and data storage.

Powerful Cameras: The front camera, which can fix focal length, has 24 mega pixel with f/2.0 aperture, and the rear camera has 48 mega pixel with f/1.8 aperture which can automatically focus, making photos bright and vibrant.

HD Plus Screen: With a curvy and rounded design, 5.0 inch is the diagonal length of the rounded corners of the screen when the corners are stretched to a right angle, allowing you to experience a wider field of view.

Multiple Function: Equipped with WiFi, BT, and FM, the dual SIM dual standby smartphone has powerful function. With 3.5mm headphone jack and USB charging port, the 5.0 unlocked cell phone bring users comfortable experience.
Facial Recognition: The 5.0in cell phone supports facial recognition, making mobile phones more intelligent. The cell phone can scan your facial features and identify them, portable and intelligent.

The smartphone is without gravity sensor.2. The mobile phone suppots the frequency band of WCDMA850/1900/2100 and GSM4. Please confirm whether your phone card belongs to this frequency band before inserting the card.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 2.1 2.1 out of 5 stars 38 ratings 2.1 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as expected
reviews.reviewText: The charger does not fit the phone and the quality is very poor. This is definately not value for the money as the phone takes a long time to come on and when it does it seems to be malfunctioning. Piece of garbage for the money. Phone is of no use.

reviews.reviewerName: Received today. The ONLY reason I purchased this phone is for the 48 mpl camera. No other reason. I wanted a high quality camera that fits in my pocket this clearly is not 48 megapixels. More like 8 .blurry off color and not very user friendly.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Camera is cheap & blurry
reviews.reviewText: Purchased ONLY for the 48 megapixel camera. No other reason. Too many useless apps that can be disabled but not removed. Not the most user friendly device. But most importantly to me, the camera is unacceptable, almost useless, It has the clarity of a 5 megapixel flip phone from 2003.I feel scammed on this $50 purchase and will return it. Absolutely do not recommend.On a positive note, the device is not the worst I've seen. Decent quality construction. Not flimsy or cheaply constructed. But the camera is trash

reviews.reviewerName: The phone is good I like it delivered was fast in good condition
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is good for the price I pay very happy thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars El producto de la presentación no coincide con lo que recibes .
reviews.reviewText: El teléfono no es visualmente lo que ofrecen . Resivi un producto que en nada se parece a lo que ví y pague . La calidad de la imagen en pantalla es orrible y en cámara también. La verdad me sentí engañado por suerte se puede devolver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY
reviews.reviewText: Horrible phone. Not even good for a little kid to even play on. Please do not buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars My bad great product not what I needed
reviews.reviewText: Great product but I didn’t read the description. The seller was amazing also! Fast friendly and professional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't waste your money....
reviews.reviewText: Slot came broken will not read sim card.
